title: F45 Training Goes Public
itunes:title: F45 Training Goes Public
description:
Adam Gilchrist, Co-Founder and CEO of F45 Training, discusses the company's listing day and the future of fitness. Carl Riccadonna, Chief Industry Economist for Bloomberg Intelligence, discusses the Fed. Hugh Johnson, Chairman and Head of Investment Strategy at Hugh Johnson Advisors, talks markets and the Fed. David Dietze, Managing Principal, Senior Portfolio Strategist for Peapack Private Wealth Management, discusses the markets. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller. (Taylor Riggs fills in for Matt Miller)

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
